description: Cart of objects aka shopping cart.
title: Cart
comment: This object gets connected with user objects.

___elements.description: Tracks all elements in the cart
___elements.title: Cart elements

items.description: Reference to one element in the cart
items.title: Cart element

___identifier.description: User-specified identifer for this cart that can be used in a URI for the cart.
___identifier.comment: This can only contain non-space characters, and must be unique throughout the system.
___identifier.title: URI-compatible cart identifier
